import React from 'react'; import BackButton from '../components/BackButton'; const About = () => { return (

About RailBite BD

Bringing delicious meals to your train journey

RailBite BD is Bangladesh's premier train food delivery service, dedicated to making your railway journey more enjoyable with fresh, delicious meals delivered right to your seat.

We understand that traveling can be tiring, and finding quality food on trains has always been a challenge. That's why we've created RailBite BD - to bring restaurant-quality meals to passengers across Bangladesh Railway.

üç±

Fresh & Hygienic

All our meals are prepared fresh with the highest hygiene standards to ensure your safety and satisfaction.

‚ö°

Fast Delivery

Order from your phone and receive your meal within 30-45 minutes, delivered directly to your seat.

üí∞

Affordable Prices

Enjoy delicious meals at reasonable prices with multiple payment options including cash and mobile banking.

üåü

Wide Selection

Choose from a variety of Bengali and international cuisines including biryani, shwarma, pizza, and more.

Our Mission

To revolutionize the train dining experience in Bangladesh by providing convenient, quality food delivery services that make every journey memorable and satisfying.

Our Vision

To become the most trusted and loved food delivery platform for railway passengers across Bangladesh, setting new standards for convenience and quality in on-train dining.

); }; export default About;
